source_objects.description: From hair styles to makeup tips, fashion tips to ageless secrets, welcome to the ultimate place for beauty & makeup courses.
source_objects.title: Beauty & Makeup

items.title: Become a PRO FREELANCE MAKEUP Artist from home

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Makeup artist and Skincare fanatic
visible_instructors.title: Emma O'Donnell
visible_instructors.name: Emma

items.headline: Find out how to be the BEST professional Makeup Artist
objectives_summary: How the right skincare and makeup can change your life

items.title: Learn Proper Size and Fit For Women's Garments
items.headline: Learn how to properly dress and buy for your body.
objectives_summary: Students will learn the proper size and fit of garments based on their body shape and type.

items.title: Learn How To Make Natural Makeup Primer
items.headline: Makeup Primer Sticks and Liquid Primer tutorials
objectives_summary: Learn how to make your own natural makeup primer sticks. The basis for a long lasting natural makeup look.

items.title: Natural Skincare : How to make natural Bath & Body Products
items.headline: How to make natural body products like bath bombs, body scrubs, bath milk and more
objectives_summary: Firstly How to Make Organic Face Cream at home
Making Aloe Vera face cream
Making Green tea face cream

items.title: Fabulous Fringy Updo hairstyles anyone can do!
items.headline: Work with ease and confidence as you master skills that keep you in high demand whether you're a pro or novice!
objectives_summary: My most watched videos are Fringy hair updos! Make your looks looser and messy for your special events!
Professionals will be able to ask for more money as their expertise grows and demand for their services increase.
Have better informed conversations with your clients that will result in more services, excitement, and greater loyalty.

items.title: Half up and Ponytail Hairstyles everyone can do!
items.headline: Learn four different styles for a variety of special events!
objectives_summary: Options abound when it comes to half-up and ponytail updos! Long and mid-length hair is capable of more options than you may have imagined. Bring smiles to your clients, family members and friends!
Professional stylists will be able to ask for more money as their expertise grows and demand for their services increase.
You got this! Have better informed conversations with your clients. This will result in more services, and greater loyalty.

items.title: Updo Hairstyles fit for the Princess in Everyone!
items.headline: Work with ease and confidence as you master skills that keep you in high demand whether you're a pro or novice!
objectives_summary: Long hair has many options! You will learn the skills to bring smiles to your clients, family and friends!
Professionals will be able to ask for more money as their expertise grows and demand for their services increase.
You will be able to have better informed conversations with your clients that will result in more services, excitement, and greater loyalty.

items.title: Elegant Half up Hairstyles for Bridal or Prom
items.headline: Work with ease and confidence as you master skills that keep you in high demand whether you're a pro or novice!
objectives_summary: Half-up styles are very popular. You will learn new skills to bring smiles to your clients and friends!
Professionals will be able to ask for more money as their expertise grows and demand for their services increase.
You will learn how easy it is to do hairstyles with sections! Grow in your services, excitement and enjoy greater guest loyalty.

items.title: Half Up Half Down Hairstyles for Curly Hair
items.headline: Work with ease and confidence as you master skills that keep you in high demand whether you're a pro or novice!
objectives_summary: You will learn fast and easy Half up Long hair has options! Bring smiles to your clients and friends!
As your expertise grows and demand for your services increase you will be able to ask for more money;)
Have better informed conversations with your clients. This will result in more services, excitement, and greater loyalty.

items.title: Introduction to Airbrush Makeup
items.headline: Learn every step of the airbrush makeup application process. Complete fun, hands-on makeup application assignments.
objectives_summary: How to understand the difference between the different types of airbrush compressors.
How to understand the difference between the different types of airbrush guns.
How to understand the pros & cons of airbrush makeup and how it differs from traditional makeup.

items.title: Floral Nails. Handpainted Flower Nail Art
items.headline: Learn to paint awesome nail art designs using gel polishes. Also you will get step by step guide how to apply gel polish
objectives_summary: Learn How to Apply Gel Nail Polish
Lern to Use Gel Polishes for Paintings
Find Out How to Give Dimension to Your Designs Using Shades and Highlights

items.title: Christmas Spirit - Learn 7 Christmas Nail Designs

visible_instructors.title: Tifrea Raluca
visible_instructors.name: Tifrea
visible_instructors.job_title: Visual artist, painter, nail art trainer

items.headline: Color gel and gel polish micro painting
objectives_summary: 7 beautiful and complex Christmas designs painted with gel and gel polish
Color theory, and how to mix the color to achieve an infinite number of colors
How to position your designs on the nails

items.title: Brows lamination and tinting.
items.headline: Eyebrows - one of the main part of face attraction, so this course will lead you to the world of beauty industry.
objectives_summary: All about brows lamination: essence of the procedure; safe hair styling; right timing of exposure.
Best mixes for brows tinting according client’s color type
Brows architecture: how to get basic reference points? Marking in 3 minutes

items.title: A BoHo Hairstyle with Braids and Curls
items.headline: Finally, a slow video breaking down all the steps to a classic BoHo Chignon with braids! Here's to your updo success!
objectives_summary: BoHo Hairstyles are in high demand. They look "easy" loose and soft but they are difficult to achieve and to keep in on certain hair types.
In this course I give an in depth look at the hair prep process,  texturizing tips plus the break down of the sectioning for easy hair construction.

items.title: Systematic Haircutting - Hot Pixie Workshop
items.headline: RHT-Workshop
objectives_summary: Systematic Haircutting - Basic Haircuts for Hairdressers
How to cut a hot pixie
How to style a hot pixie cut

items.title: How To Make A 5x5 Lace Closure Wig?
items.headline: Let's make a wig together
objectives_summary: Students will learn the secrets to making a wig by hand.
